select.if: SELECT T2.SAP_MAT_CD SAP_MAT_CD , T2.PD_NM PD_NM , T1.PU_QTY , NVL(T6.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) OG_GD_QTY , NVL(T5.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) INDV_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.PU_PART_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T3 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T3.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T4 ON T4.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T4.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = T3.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND T4.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '21' AND T4.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ T5 ON T5.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T5.WARE_NO = T4.WARE_NO AND T1.PU_PART_PD_CD = T5.ITM_PD_CD AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ T6 ON T6.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T6.WARE_NO = T4.HGR_WARE_NO AND T1.PU_PART_PD_CD = T6.ITM_PD_CD AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo}
